text:
22.8. Plot Distribution Per Activity 468
Figure 22.8: Histograms of the body acceleration data by activity.
The ﬁnal ﬁgure summarizes the gyroscopic data per activity for the ﬁrst subject. We can see
plots with the similar pattern as the body acceleration data, although showing perhaps fat-tailed
Gaussian-like distributions instead of bimodal distributions for the in-motion activities.
